channel.title: Server status
channel.description: how can i remove my server from the list.. i removed the one i made but kids keep putting it on there, dunno why... and im being invaded by 50 people at 1 time all massing, lagging it, syipkpker kids crashing.. so how do i get my server removed from the list? :mad:

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @Breaking_Shadow Breaking_Shadow
item.description:
@Breaking_Shadow wrote:

firstly, you cannot remove your server from the page until it’s uptime reaches 40%, if you really want to get rid of them, i think you should close your server around 10 mins, they should stop bothering you.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

don’t think you understand. i got about 20 steady members playing all the time. i want to keep it that way. i cant change my port then they cant play. i cant tell em all the port because they aint on at same time. but kids put on moparscape server status page and im bombed with random kids who mass constantly, and say “shutup n00b i do wot i want kuz its wot i do!!!1!!” and i cant be bothered with kids like that on my server…

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

well change the port then they can´t come up to ur server

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

my problem is, as soon as its removed, some retard will put it back up…

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @l3lack_r4nge1 l3lack r4nge
item.description:
@l3lack_r4nge1 wrote:

u cannot…u could only don’t run server and then wait it till under 40%
and it will be gone

Read full topic
